how do i stream ksp without lag to youtube?

i'm using obs (open broadcaster software) but it always crashes or makes fps real low.

please help!

my specs:

i3 3120m 2.5GHz

nvidia geforce gt 635m 1gb vram

8gm ram
Windows? 32bit or 64bit? Your CPU is not very powerful, good enough just barely, on top of 32bit, you probably don't have enough oomph

64bit windows 8

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T00:57:16Z" title="08/09/2015 12:57  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Cannon**
what are the right settings for OBS btw?

Reduce your capture resolution and framerate, that will make the processor's job easier. For the bitrate a common recommendation is 0.1 bits per pixel, so do *(width x height x fps x 0.1)/1024* to get a suitable bitrate in kbps. If you're recording at 720p, 30 fps that means 2700 kbps.
Do you use *Game Capture*? I remember experiencing some serious lags when experimenting with it about one year ago. It could have already been fixed though.

[https://obsproject.com/](https://obsproject.com/)

Most streamers use that. It's free and pretty high performance.

That's actually what OP uses ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Yes I'm using game capture

So try *Window Capture*. It might help, but I can't guarantee.
